cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote SCTP data port to 0 (invalid port) will cause SCTP socket connection failure, preventing F1-U connection establishment between CU and DU.

du.explanation_en: Setting the remote N data port to 0 (invalid port) will cause SCTP socket connection failure, preventing F1-U connection establishment between DU and CU.
du.explanation_zh: 將遠端 N 數據端口設定為 0（無效端口）會導致 SCTP 套接字連接失敗，防止 DU 與 CU 之間建立 F1-U 連接。
